au_350679: #!/bin/bash

lang=$(locale | grep LANGUAGE | cut -d= -f2 | cut -d_ -f1)

PathToParentDir="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
sudo linguist-qt4 $PathToParentDir/translate_$lang.ts
